string.text: Ukrainian Heavy Metal Magazine Terroraiser #75 and #3 from the year 2018, written in Russian. Contains exclusive interviews for bands such as: DEICIDE (cover of the magazine), KORPIKLAANI, BLEED FROM WITHIN, DARK MILLENIUM and many others as well as festival reports such as Wacken 2018 and Black Sea Metal Fest 2018.\n

Ukrainian Heavy Metal Magazine Atmosfear #17, written in Russian, that features a glossy cover and 136 pages of professional printing with original design feature interviews with bands such as: MOONSORROW (cover of the magazine), NIGHTRAGE, CALIBAN, BUTTERFLY TEMPLE, EGES, MASSEMORD, SPACE MUTATED CORPSE, GRAVEWORM, ENTOMBED A.D., GEORGE KOLLIAS and many more. This magazine celebrates the 10 years anniversary of the Russian doom label SOLITUDE PRODUCTIONS. This edition contains comprehensive reports of the legendary band NARGAROTH's concert in Kyiv, as well as the COYOTE BRUTAL FEST 10 and FIRE OF DEATH FEST, as well as a total of over 200 reviews covering the latest releases in all styles of heavy metal music.\n
